deviceEmpty.usb.title: USB connection mode
deviceEmpty.guide.title: Laxi User Guide
deviceEmpty.usb.step1: 1. Connect the USB cable to the computer
deviceEmpty.usb.step1.tip: After successful USB connection, you can switch to WIFI ADB, OTG wireless mode
deviceEmpty.usb.step2: 2.Open "Developer Options" on your phone and enable the following switches within Developer Options
deviceEmpty.usb.help.title: How to turn on the "Developer Options".
deviceEmpty.usb.help.text: Phone - advanced settings - version information (version number) - click on it several times, return to settings, and find "Developer Options" in settings
deviceEmpty.usb.help.tip: Haven't found it yet? Click {icon} to help you
shareDeviceManage.title: Share device management across networks
shareDeviceManage.close.message: You've closed the device sharing window. Reopen it in 'Common Settings' when needed.
shareDeviceManage.emptyMessage: No device info for sharing. Right-click on the desired device and choose 'Share'.
deviceEmpty.wifi.title: Wireless Modes (WIFI ADB, OTG)
deviceEmpty.wifi.describe.text: WIFI ADB mode must first be enabled in the phone WIFI debugging function. It allows your phone to use wireless instead of USB connection. Get rid of the need to connect a lot of USB cables. Group control and cell phones use the network to connect.
deviceEmpty.wifi.describe.tip: It supports different vLan network segments of computers and cell phones, but requires the networks of computers and cell phones to be interoperable.
deviceEmpty.wifi.help.title: How to enable WIFI ADB:
deviceEmpty.wifi.help.text: 1.In USB mode,Right mouse ->(WIFI ADB 5555){br}2.advanced settings ->automatically turn the USB connected devices to WIFI ADB debugging mode
deviceEmpty.wifi.tip: Friendly reminder: By default, the WIFI ADB feature will automatically turn off after restarting the phone. Some third-party firmware packages can enable WIFI debugging automatically when the phone starts up.

otgDialog.network.error.lastItemMismatch: The last bit of segment 1 must be smaller than the last bit of segment 2 under the same segment

otgHelpDialog.content: WIFI ADB means to turn on the phone's WIFI debugging function (default port 5555) to achieve the effect of USB debugging. You can connect to the phone without connecting the phone to the USB of the computer to connect with the phone using the network.
otgHelpDialog.tip: Support computer and cell phone different vLan network segment, but it requires the computer and cell phone network to interoperate.

sidebarBox.tab.wsapi.describe: You can easily develop fully automated tools using any programming language you like (such as Python,golang,C++, etc.), without installing an app on the phone, or using accessibility permissions. You can achieve operations such as obtaining images, text input, screen clicking, sliding, and dragging.

networkErrorDialog.content: Laixi attempted to access the {url} domain and failed. Possible reasons for this error:
networkErrorDialog.solutions:
1. The domain cannot be resolved. Please try changing your local DNS.
      2. Disable any proxy or VPN on your computer (if any).
      3. There may be a firewall interception by the system or router. Please allow access.

quickScriptDialog.title: Chat
quickScriptDialog.group.instructions.sen: How to send phrases: Double-clicking on the list allows input. Clicking on the box-arrow icon at the beginning of the list pastes it into the input box
quickScriptDialog.group.instructions.cre: Add Group: Right-clicking in the light blue area of the phrases allows adding a new group.
Add Phrases: In the white area below the group section, right-click to see the menu, then select New phrase.
quickScriptDialog.group.instructions.bat: How to batch process: Use CTRL + left-click to select multiple phrases; Use SHIFT + left-click to select multiple blocks; After selection, right-click to execute various operations from the context menu.
quickScriptDialog.group.commonPhrases.fi: Hello, dear customer. I'm very happy to serve you. How can I assist you today?
quickScriptDialog.group.commonPhrases.se: There are many customers at the moment. I'm sorry, but please wait a moment. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
quickScriptDialog.group.commonPhrases.th: Hello dear customer! Generally, our store uses XXX courier by default. If you need to use another courier, you can contact our customer service directly! We will ship according to the courier you mentioned. If you need to use SF Express, an additional shipping fee of XX yuan will be required. Thank you for your understanding!
quickScriptDialog.group.commonPhrases.fo: Dear customer, we can arrange the shipment for you within 48 hours after your purchase!
quickScriptDialog.group.commonPhrases.fi: Dear customer, our store supports 7-day unconditional returns and exchanges. If you are not satisfied upon receiving the goods, please contact us within 48 hours for a return or exchange. We will cover the shipping cost for quality issues, but if the return or exchange is due to personal reasons such as not liking the item, wrong size, or it not meeting your expectations, you will need to cover the round-trip shipping cost. Therefore, please inspect the package in front of the courier before signing for it.

setQuickScriptDialog.basicSetting.otherS: Click on the color block in the list to copy it to the clipboard
Double-click the list to copy to clipboard
setQuickScriptDialog.shortcutKeys.tip: Shortcut to switch script groups: Shift + ↑↓←→
setQuickScriptDialog.shortcutKeys.checkb: (Keyboard F1-F9 corresponds to the content of the script, preview displayed after sending)
colorDialog.title: Set Color Category
tutorialDialog.batchFileDistribution.con: {modify} needs to distribute to the corresponding {subName} of the corresponding device, based on the {number}. After execution, all files in the folder named by the number will be accurately sent to the corresponding numbered device.
tutorialDialog.sendPreview.title: Send Preview Tutorial
tutorialDialog.sendPreview.firstStep: 1.Open the main control dialogue - Settings - Shortcut Keys, {check} Send Preview.
tutorialDialog.sendPreview.secondStep: 2. After pressing the {quickInputPhrase} button in the input box of the mobile app, the full content of the corresponding phrase is briefly displayed on the screen for browsing and will automatically close.
tutorialDialog.quickInput.title: Phrase Quick Input
tutorialDialog.quickInput.firstStep: 1. Open {mainControl} and click to open the phrase (the {right} also applies). If there is no phrase option in the right taskbar of the main control, you can check to display it in the customization settings.
tutorialDialog.quickInput.secondStep: 2. Phrase settings - Shortcut keys: {check} Phrase Quick Input.
tutorialDialog.quickInput.thirdStep: 3. Press F1-F9 in {input}, the content of {currentPhraseGroup} under {number} will be automatically pasted into the input box.{right}
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.firstStep: Display scripts on the right side of the console
1.Open the control panel, default to display scripts on the right side of the console, enabling quick script sending without needing to open the script dialog.
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.default: default to display scripts on the right side of the console
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.secondSte: Quickly switch script groups on the right side of the control panel
2.Quickly switch script groups by pressing {shortcutKeys}, and select the appropriate group to send scripts.
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.thirdStep: Preview the content of scripts on the right side of the control panel

3. The right side of the control panel displays a column of colored dots for each script, representing their color categories.{hover} with the mouse {displaysContent}. To modify/set color categories, open the "Scripts" dialog.
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.displaysC: displays the full content of the script
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.fourthSte: How to send a phrase from the right side of the main control
tutorialDialog.showQuickScript.fifthStep: Closing the phrases on the right side of the main control

5. In Laixi's {advancedUncheck}, "Display phrases on the right side of the main control", or open the right side phrase's {generalUncheck} "Display phrases on the right side of the main control" to close the phrases on the right side of the main control.
tutorialDialog.keyboardClipboard.title: Enable Keyboard Clipboard
tutorialDialog.keyboardClipboard.firstSt: 1. Open {mainControl} Lexi conversation (default with keyboard input).
tutorialDialog.keyboardClipboard.secondS: 2. {check} Enable keyboard clipboard. PS: Uncheck, or manually {turnOff} keyboard input, {unableToExecute} related functions.
tutorialDialog.keyboardClipboard.thirdSt: 3. Enter the key content of the conversation in {keyboardInput}, automatically search for related conversation for you, click {selectToSend}.

backupDialog.table.label.name: Remark Name
backupDialog.tip: It is recommended to back up the machine's information before performing a restore, as the restore function will overwrite the existing numbers and group information on this machine.
backupMessageDialog.tip: Backup the current computer's ADB authorization files, Laixi numbers, and group information to the cloud.
backupMessageDialog.requestRestore: I have backed up, please restore
backupMessage.beforeRestore: Before restoring the backup, it is recommended to back up the current information of the machine. Whether to continue?
backupMessage.beforeRestore.tip: Laixi will be restarted after restoring the backup. Please be careful to save the current computer work.
backupMessage.downloadAndRestore: Downloaded from the cloud and restored to this machine
backupMessage.clickToRestart: Click Complete, and Laixi will automatically restart to apply the settings
